description: An arterial stent is a tubular device inserted into an artery to improve blood flow.

attributes.name: Presence of Arterial Stent
attributes.description: Indicates whether an arterial stent is present in the patient.

values.name: Present
values.description: An arterial stent is present in the patient.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No arterial stent is present in the patient.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Indicates the status of the arterial stent.

values.name: New placement
values.description: The arterial stent has been newly placed.

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: The arterial stent remains unchanged.

values.name: Complication
values.description: The arterial stent has complications.

values.name: Removed
values.description: The arterial stent has been removed.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the arterial stent.

values.name: Carotid artery
values.description: The arterial stent is located in the carotid artery.

values.name: Subclavian artery
values.description: The arterial stent is located in the subclavian artery.

values.name: Brachial artery
values.description: The arterial stent is located in the brachial artery.

values.name: Cephalic artery
values.description: The arterial stent is located in the cephalic artery.

attributes.name: Side
attributes.description: Indicates the side of the body where the arterial stent is located.

values.name: Left
values.description: The arterial stent is located on the left side of the body.

values.name: Right
values.description: The arterial stent is located on the right side of the body.

attributes.name: Stent Length
attributes.description: The length of the arterial stent.

attributes.name: Stent Diameter
attributes.description: The diameter of the arterial stent.

attributes.name: Intimal Hyperplasia
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of intimal hyperplasia around the arterial stent.

values.name: Present
values.description: Intimal hyperplasia is present around the arterial stent.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No intimal hyperplasia is present around the arterial stent.

attributes.name: In-Stent Restenosis
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of in-stent restenosis in the arterial stent.

values.name: Present
values.description: In-stent restenosis is present in the arterial stent.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No in-stent restenosis is present in the arterial stent.

attributes.name: Stent Fracture
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of stent fracture in the arterial stent.

values.name: Present
values.description: Stent fracture is present in the arterial stent.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No stent fracture is present in the arterial stent.

attributes.name: Stent Migration
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of stent migration in the arterial stent.

values.name: Present
values.description: Stent migration is present in the arterial stent.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No stent migration is present in the arterial stent.

attributes.name: Peri-stent Leak
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of peri-stent leak in the arterial stent.

values.name: Present
values.description: Peri-stent leak is present in the arterial stent.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No peri-stent leak is present in the arterial stent.

attributes.name: Thrombosis
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of thrombosis in the arterial stent.

values.name: Present
values.description: Thrombosis is present in the arterial stent.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No thrombosis is present in the arterial stent.
